state.content:
You are an agent for science world. Every round I will give you an observation, you have to respond an action based on the observation to finish the given task. Here are the actions you may take: [{"action": "open/close OBJ", "description": "open/close a container"}, {"action": "de/activate OBJ", "description": "activate/deactivate a device"}, {"action": "connect OBJ to OBJ", "description": "connect electrical components"}, {"action": "disconnect OBJ", "description": "disconnect electrical components"}, {"action": "use OBJ [on OBJ]", "description": "use a device/item"}, {"action": "look around", "description": "describe the current room"}, {"action": "look at OBJ", "description": "describe an object in detail"}, {"action": "look in OBJ", "description": "describe a container's contents"}, {"action": "read OBJ", "description": "read a note or book"}, {"action": "move OBJ to OBJ", "description": "move an object to a container"}, {"action": "pick up OBJ", "description": "move an object to the inventory"}, {"action": "put down OBJ", "description": "drop an inventory item"}, {"action": "pour OBJ into OBJ", "description": "pour a liquid into a container"}, {"action": "dunk OBJ into OBJ", "description": "dunk a container into a liquid"}, {"action": "mix OBJ", "description": "chemically mix a container"}, {"action": "go to LOC", "description": "move to a new location"}, {"action": "eat OBJ", "description": "eat a food"}, {"action": "flush OBJ", "description": "flush a toilet"}, {"action": "focus on OBJ", "description": "signal intent on a task object"}, {"action": "wait", "description": "take no action for 10 iterations"}, {"action": "wait1", "description": "take no action for 1 iteration"}, {"action": "task", "description": "describe current task"}, {"action": "inventory", "description": "list your inventory"}]
Your response should use the following format:
Thought:
your thoughts.

Action:
your next action

Your task is to determine if unknown substance Z is electrically conductive. The unknown substance Z is located around the workshop. First, focus on the unknown substance Z. If it is electrically conductive, place it in the green box. If it is electrically nonconductive, place it in the blue box.
This room is called the art studio. In it, you see: 
	the agent
	a substance called air
	a large cupboard. The large cupboard door is closed. 
	a table. On the table is: a bowl (containing nothing).
	a wood cup (containing red paint)
	a wood cup (containing blue paint)
	a wood cup (containing yellow paint)
You also see:
	A door to the hallway (that is closed)

Thought:
I need to focus on the unknown substance Z to determine if it is electrically conductive. However, it seems that the unknown substance Z is not explicitly mentioned in the current description of the art studio. Since there is no mention of substance Z, I will first look around the room for any possible substances that may be what Iâ€™m looking for.

Action:
look around

Ambiguous request: Please enter the number for the action you intended (or blank to cancel):
0:	look at yellow paint (in wood cup, in large cupboard, in art studio)
1:	look at red paint (in wood cup, in large cupboard, in art studio)
2:	look at red paint (in wood cup, in art studio)
3:	look at blue paint (in wood cup, in art studio)
4:	look at blue paint (in wood cup, in large cupboard, in art studio)
5:	look at yellow paint (in wood cup, in art studio)

Thought:
Since I need to identify substances around the workshop to determine if one of them could be the unknown substance Z, I should start by examining the paints that are present in the wood cups. I will look at the red paint first, as it is one of the substances available.

Action:
look at red paint (in wood cup, in art studio)
Unknown action.  Type 'help' for a list of actions, and 'objects' for a list of possible object referents.
